text: PIM-35, also known as 5-methoxyindolyl-2-methylamine, is a drug which is an indole derivative with a similar chemical structure to that of serotonin. It acts as a serotonin reuptake inhibitor and produces antidepressant-like effects in animal studies. == References == Category:Amines Category:Antidepressants Category:Indoles Category:Phenol ethers Category:Serotonin reuptake inhibitors
title: PIM-35
